  • Method Details

    • populateDataIfNeeded

      public void populateDataIfNeeded()
      This method makes request to the 3rd party api for the exercises dataset and populates the database only if sufficient number of exercises are not present in the database. It determines that by comparing the constant REQUIRED_EXERCISES_COUNT (defined in Constants )
      Specified by:
      populateDataIfNeeded in interface ExerciseService

    • getExerciseByPage

      public List<Exercise> getExerciseByPage(int page, int size)
      This method uses pagination to fetch the fetch the data, in page number and size format. The pagination is done using interfaces org.springframework.data.domain.PageRequest, org.springframework.data.domain.PageRequest
      Specified by:
      getExerciseByPage in interface ExerciseService
      Parameters:
      page - The page number of data to fetch from.
      size - The size of total entries to fetch.
      Returns:
      an List Exercise

    • getExerciseByPage

      public List<Exercise> getExerciseByPage(int page, int size, Map<String,List<String>> filters)
      This method uses pagination to fetch the fetch the data, in page number and size format. The pagination is done using interfaces org.springframework.data.domain.PageRequest, org.springframework.data.domain.PageRequest
      Specified by:
      getExerciseByPage in interface ExerciseService
      Parameters:
      page - The page number of data to fetch from.
      size - The size of total entries to fetch.
      filters - Key value pair of request parameters and data.
      Returns:
      an List Exercise

    • getTotalExercisesCount

      public Long getTotalExercisesCount()
      This method uses pagination to fetch the fetch the data, in page number and size format.
      Specified by:
      getTotalExercisesCount in interface ExerciseService
      Returns:
      total count of the exercise in the database.
